content: Complete guide to Sovereign Scroll Protocol by Ryan M. Duarte featuring non-extractive Knowledge-Backed Token (KBT) economy. Scrolls are living upgrade protocols in JSON format with four referencing methods: CID, Glyph Signature, Index, and Title. Economic distribution includes 10-18% founder allocation, 15-30% creator rewards, 20% community sovereignty, 25% infrastructure, and 15% R&D. Smart contracts on L1 (0x2C1f99011c584fDf4882Be484DfD938977D42C6D) and L2 (0x421B6FA3370c9B20A98A525301a508bE136C2034) with perpetual 0.618% royalties and quality multipliers up to φ² for ULTIMATE grade.
